quotes.quote: “If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.”
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: “Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.”
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: “Science knows no country, because knowledge belongs to humanity, and is the torch which illuminates the world.”
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: “Research is what I'm doing when I don't know what I'm doing.”
quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

quotes.quote: “The good thing about science is that it's true whether or not you believe in it.”
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: “The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.”
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: “Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.”
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: “The scientist is not a person who gives the right answers, he is one who asks the right questions.”
quotes.author: Claude Lévi-Strauss

quotes.quote: “It is far better to grasp the universe as it really is than to persist in delusion, however satisfying and reassuring.”
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: “To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of junk.”
quotes.author: Thomas Edison
